ygData.subject: RE: A warning for Fenin Ro players
ygData.msgSnippet: i got my faction upto warmly by doing the white sash quest about 50 times or more.;) i got my faction so high with the guild that i defeated a guild master in
ygData.messageBody:
i got my faction upto warmly by doing the white sash quest about 50 times or
more.;)
i got my faction so high with the guild that i defeated a guild master in a
dual for the black sash and they still see me warmly.8)

to do the quest as quickly as possible go and get a backpack or 2 and
collect all the needed components from a vendor to do the quest a few times.
all components are stackable so its not to hard to get @least 40 orc scalps,
20 bones, and 20 snake skins.
then just set there and keep turning in the needed components while
destroying the sashes.
it's kinda tedious but it gets the job done.

saihung of tunare

-----Original Message-----
From: Court Little [mailto:courtlend@...]
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 2:34 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] A warning for Fenin Ro players


From: "Court Little" <courtlend@...>

O.K. I need help!!!!!! Im a monk form Qeynos and Im trying to do the
freeport monk quests but it wont let me! Whenever I try it the monks say I
need to prove myself or some such message but I can find nothing to kill/do
in order to incresae my faction to do their quests. IM curently working on
the red headband questout of qey. Any Ideas????????? At this point Ill take
anything legal or not to get started. IM tired of seeing everybody doing
both quests while I can only do one!
